==No-fault liability==
The French Public Health Code ([https://www.legifrance.gouv.fr/codes/article_lc/LEGIARTI000020628252/ article L1142-1]) provides for ''two liability regimes'' in medical law:

*A fault-based liability regime,
*no-fault liability.

The aim of no-fault liability is to make good the loss suffered by compensating the victim (or his heirs) "without having to prove fault" on the part of the person who caused the loss.

==Role of ONIAM===
In the event of a medical accident, the victim (or his/her heirs) may refer the matter to the ''Commission de Conciliation et d'Indemnisation'' [CCI] in his/her region. In the case of ''no-fault'' liability, the victim will be compensated by the Office National d'Indemnisation des Accidents Médicaux, des Affections Iatrogènes et des Infections Nosocomiales (ONIAM) on the basis of ''national solidarity''.

The ONIAM's mission is therefore to organise a system of "out-of-court", rapid and free compensation for victims of medical accidents, whether at fault (in the event of insurance failure) or not, "without going to court".

question.title: What is the purpose of the Office National d'Indemnisation des Accidents Médicaux, des Affections Iatrogènes et des Infections Nosocomiales (ONIAM)?
question.description: The Office National d'Indemnisation des Accidents Médicaux, des Affections Iatrogènes et des Infections Nosocomiales (ONIAM) is responsible for providing compensation to victims of medical accidents.

option_a.title: To provide compensation to victims of medical accidents, regardless of fault
option_a.description: The ONIAM provides compensation to victims of medical accidents, but only in cases where fault can be proven

option_b.title: To organize a system of out-of-court, rapid and free compensation for victims of medical accidents
option_b.description: The ONIAM's mission is to provide compensation to victims of medical accidents, whether at fault or not, in a rapid and free manner

option_c.title: To investigate medical accidents and provide compensation to victims
option_c.description: The ONIAM is responsible for investigating medical accidents and providing compensation to victims, but only in cases where fault can be proven

option_d.title: To provide compensation to victims of medical accidents, based on national solidarity
option_d.description: The ONIAM provides compensation to victims of medical accidents, based on national solidarity, and operates an out-of-court system
